name: Amoret Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Orlando apartment, it is a lovely place located in the heart of the old city. It is beautifully decorated and it makes a great base to expore Dubrovnik and sample the great restaurants located thoughout the old town.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Situated in the heart of the old town, it is ideal for experiencing the beautiful city of Dubrovnik. The Divona apartment has a lovely view of surrounding old buildings. There were no problems and it was a pleasure to stay there.
reviews.title: Very well situated
Nice Rooms
reviews.text: Stayed in both locations. Simple, functional and clean rooms in a fantastic location. There are LOTS of steps up to the rooms though so be prepared if you have heavy luggage. The room in D.Ranjine street was very noisy through a lot of the night as it's facing one of the main squares and has restaurants underneath (but had a fabulous view). The room in Restićeva street ("Divona") didn't have this problem as the windows are double glazed, however we could hear the neighbours in the rooms next door and above. Bring your ear plugs and you will most likely have an enjoyable stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely clean apartments, with an amazing location inside the old city walls. Branka, the owner, was very friendly and helpful, delighful to deal with. Very happy to have found these apartments and hope to return in the near future.
reviews.title: Only Amoret in the Old Town

likes.disliked: — Some mysterious noises from upper floor like furniture moving and bongo playing each day

reviews.text: Myself and my now husband went to Dubrovnik in June 07 to get married and booked 3 of the amoret apartments for ourselves and family. This was our second visit to Dubrovnik and definitely the loveliest and best located accommodation for such a reasonable price in all of Dubrovnik. The owner Branka is extremely helpful and even left a wedding card and little wedding present in our room for us, which was very surprising. I would recommend this place to everyone. If we'd known how fab these apartments were we would have booked a lot sooner and gotten all of our friends in there.
reviews.title: The best host in Dubrovnik
Fantastic Apartments
reviews.text: We rented this apartment for our pre-wedding stay in Dubrovnik, and had a great time in this property, situated in a wonderfully central location. Our family and friends also stayed in four other apartments owned by Branka last year, which were all of a similar high standard.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartment has air condititioning, is clean, simple and fully functional, and we found Branka to be extremely professional, pleasant, courteous and understanding to our needs.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have no hesitation in fully recommending the Amoret Apartment and all other rental properties managed by Branka.
reviews.title: Excellent location in the Old City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were to stay half the week in Dubrovnik old town & the other half along the coast, but changed our plans to stay the whole time in Amoret 2 apartments - on Dinka Ranjike 5, behind the Pucic Palace Hotel.
reviews.title: Best of both worlds, modern inside medieval outside

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staying there gave us the feel of living in an ancient walled city, if you left the windows open you could hear the sounds of the narrow back streets & of the neighborhood - I can't imagine living in such an age.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And of course if you closed the windows you could sleep in quiet peacefulness.
reviews.title: A home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything we wanted to do & every where we wanted to go was in easy reach of our apartment there.
reviews.title: Great apartment, worth every penny.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Branka was a delightful hostess & has decorated her rooms with an old family house feeling complete with linens on the bed & on the table in the room - but then has added local modern art on the walls together with a framed piece of lacework from her Grandmother in our room we were told when we extended our stay.
reviews.title: Loved it!

reviews.text: We stayed in apartment Bokar for our three nights in Dubrovnik. After staying here I believe that the old town area of Dubrovnik is the only way to experience this lovely town and the Amoret apartments (either location) fit this requirement perfectly. We used the kitchenette to have our breakfast and lunch but there are so many fantastic places to either have an afternoon drink or a reasonable dinner out that we found we did this in the evening. The Cafe Buza (bar) on the outside of the city wall on the cliffs looking over the water was a great experience. Branca was very helpful and ensured our room was ready as soon as possible as we had arrived early on the ferry from Italy. Her restaurant recommendations were also very helpful. When I return to Dubrovnik I will be contacting Branca again as the apartments situated up a narrow lane off the main area were perfectly situated and very quiet at night.
reviews.title: Perfect stay in Dubrovnik old town

likes.liked: — Position in the old town, great sized room with kitchenette

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's been almost a year since we were there and I have been meaning to write this for a while now but NYC has a way of distracting you. We stayed at three of Branka's apartments and found them all to be jem's in their own right. Minceta was quaint however a little noisy. We then stayed in Lovrijenac which was great and enjoyed the balcony. We ended our stay at Divona that has an amazing view of old town. My only complaint was the noise which was caused by fellow tourists from England staying next to us and that has nothing to do with Branka or the nice apartments. That is why the apartments get 5 stars in our book and helped make our vacation wonderful.
reviews.title: Wonderful

likes.disliked: — noise by fellow guests had nothing to do with apartments

reviews.text: super location. we stayed @ divona, steps from the cathedral,the rectors palace & the old port. the daily market is also around the corner. owner branka was very helpful & pleasant. cant recommend this apartment enough. just downstirs is the restaurant by the same name which i also recommend highly. super location in old city, very few steps[ 1 flight to divona] despite some comments on this site.
reviews.title: superb location in old town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have just returned from a wonderful week in Croatia. We stayed at Amoret apartments for 3 days and is was the nicest accommodation we booked during our 10 day stay.
reviews.title: Perfect and cute apartment in the heart of the old town!

likes.liked: — It was very clean and nicely decorated

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Orlando room and it is beautifully decorated in a romantic way. There is a small table and cooking facilities- perfect!
reviews.title: Loved the Amoret

likes.disliked: — The bed wasn't the most comfortable

description: Five beautiful four stars studio self catering apartments on three beautiful location in the center of Dubrovnik old town, some of them just in front of the Chatedral and near by the Buža beach and another ones behind the green market square and famous Hotel Pucic Palace.
